multiplechoiceresponse.label: What is a unique aspect of StarCraft as a game for deep reinforcement learning?
multiplechoiceresponse.description: You can add an optional tip or note related to the prompt like this.

choicegroup.choice: It is a perfect information game played in real time
It requires short-term planning and quick decision-making
It is a cooperative game that can be played with multiple players
It is a turn-based game that allows for extensive analysis
